source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_000<tab>To hear Thesauros's excuses, one might think it necessary to sell your firstborn to afford a comfortable chair and desk. Surely it isn't <var 1A 02 /var>impossible<var 1A 01 /var> to properly furnish a laboratory on a budget?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_000<tab>優しい人、君の申し出に感謝するよ。
椅子や机って良いものになると本当に高くてね、
資材院に頼み込んでも、環境が改善されないんだ……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_001<tab>Hello, my fair gleaner! How goes the campaign of feline satisfaction?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_001<tab>やあ、マイグリーナーくん！
ローリング・スプリングくんの要望どおり、
猫がメロメロになりそうな品は見つかったかな？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_002<tab>Oh good, you're back. I think Ibuki is growing restless, so let's surround her with darling monstrosities before she launches a second assault upon Hodge.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_002<tab>待っていたよ！
イブキくんがホッジくんに再突撃してしまう前に、
彼女を立体造形物で囲んでしまおうじゃないか！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_003<tab>A pleasure as always, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((man)) /var> of peerless procurement. Have you anything to soothe Grondilvet's tired eyes?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_003<tab>マイ・ワンダフル・グリーナーくんのお出ましだ！
グロンディルヴェくんたちの目を癒す算段はついたかな？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_004<tab>Another day, another battle of attrition against the enemies of ingenuity. Thrice-damned misers, the lot of them. But how do <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> fare, my friend?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GREETING_MARGRAT_000_004<tab>顔を見られて嬉しいぞ、マイグリーナーくん！
今日も今日とて私たちは働き、新たな成果と要求を生んでは、
ホッジくんにフラれているよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>何をする？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Make a delivery (<var 20 E803 /var> remaining).
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>依頼品を渡す（<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>：残り<var 20 E803 /var>回）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Cast glamour on Margrat.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>マーグラットに武具投影を行う

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Learn about custom deliveries.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>「お得意様取引」について聞く

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>What would you learn more about?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>Satisfaction level.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>マーグラットの信頼度について

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Delivery requirements and rewards.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>納品の条件と報酬について

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>Procuring collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>依頼品の入手方法

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>Acquiring materials.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>製作の「素材」の入手について

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>Increasing the value of crafted collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>収集価値の上げ方について（製作編）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>Increasing the value of gathered collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>収集価値の上げ方について（採掘・園芸編）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>Increasing the value of fish.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>収集価値の上げ方について（漁師編）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_001_000<tab>With each successful delivery, Margrat will come to trust you more and more, leading her to task you with assignments of greater importance.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_001_000<tab>依頼品を納品することで、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>のあなたに対する信頼度は、
少しずつ上昇していきます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_001_001<tab>This will be displayed in the form of a gauge atop the Custom Deliveries list. Fill this gauge to the maximum, and Margrat's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─as represented by little golden hearts─will increase.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_001_001<tab>現在の信頼度は、依頼品リスト上部のゲージに表示され、
これが最大まで溜まることで、「信頼ランク」が上昇します。
なお、信頼ランクはハートマークの数で表現されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Upon reaching a new <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you will have the opportunity to learn more about the researchers of Labyrinthos.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_001_002<tab>また、信頼ランクが上昇する際には、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>にまつわる、
新たなストーリーを見ることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_007_000<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 80 or above.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_007_000<tab>納品は、アイテムの種類に応じたクラスになり、
そのクラスのレベルが80以上の場合、
納品することができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_007_001<tab>If you are level 89 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 90 scrips reward.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_007_001<tab>納品時、クラスのレベルが89以下の場合は、
レベル90時のスクリップ報酬の代わりに、
経験値報酬を得られます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Should you find yourself unsure as to how to procure a particular item, subcommands and item descriptions can point you in the right direction.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_000<tab>依頼品リストのアイテムの入手方法を調べたい場合は、
サブコマンドやアイテムヘルプを活用しましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_001<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the recipe for the item in question.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_001<tab>「クラフター全般」の場合、リストを選択した状態で、
サブコマンド「製作方法を検索」を実行すると、
製作手帳が開き、製作レシピが表示されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Likewise, for Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_002<tab>「採掘師」と「園芸師」の場合、リストを選択した状態で、
サブコマンド「採集方法を検索」を実行すると、
採集手帳が開き、採集場所が示されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_003<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_003<tab>「漁師」の場合、リストを選択した状態で、
サブコマンド「入手場所の表示」を実行すると、
該当の魚を入手できる釣り場・漁場が示されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_102_003<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_102_003<tab>なお、釣りを行う際は、
釣り餌に「<var 28 ((Item)) F26FDA01 /var>」を使うとよいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_004<tab>The items sought by Margrat fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Margrat deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_002_004<tab><var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>へ納品できるアイテムは、
「クラフター全般」と「採掘師／園芸師」、「漁師」の3種になり、
それらはすべて「収集品」である必要があります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Margrat seeks may be purchased from R'dhyanki in Sharlayan Hamlet.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_003_000<tab>依頼品の製作に必要な素材は、
ラヴィリンソスの「リトルシャーレアン」にいる、
「ル・ヒャンキ」から購入可能です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_004_000<tab>The collectability of crafted items is directly related to their quality. Spare no effort in ensuring that the items you craft are of the highest possible quality, and you will be rewarded accordingly.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_004_000<tab>クラフターの製作品の「収集価値」は、
製作時に「品質」を高めることで、上昇します。
そのため、できるだけ品質を高めて完成させることが重要です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_004_002<tab>The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inner Quiet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status, granted each time you successfully increase quality, will serve you particularly well.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_004_002<tab>品質が上がるアクションに成功すると、
自身に「インナークワイエット」が付与されていきます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_004_003<tab>Accumulate as many stacks of the status as you can, then put the final flourish on your masterpiece with <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Byregot's Blessing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_004_003<tab>できるだけ多くのインナークワイエットを蓄積させておき、
最後に「ビエルゴの祝福」などで、
一気に品質を上げてから完成させるといいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_004_004<tab>There are a host of other actions that can serve to further enhance the quality of items you craft. Once you've mastered the fundamentals, you are encouraged to experiment with varied approaches until you find your preferred crafting method.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_004_004<tab>他にも、品質を上げるために有用なアクションは存在します。
慣れてきたら、いろいろと試して自分なりの製作パターンを、
模索してみるとよいでしょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Before gathering a collectable item, you must increase its collectability.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_005_000<tab>収集品採集アイテムを選ぶと、特殊なウィンドウが表示されます。
収集品採集用アクションを使い、
「収集価値」を上げてから、アイテムを採集します。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_005_001<tab>One technique miners and botanists may employ to raise collectability is the use of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scrutiny<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scour<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Try executing this combination a few times before gathering the item.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_005_001<tab>「採掘師」と「園芸師」で収集価値を上げるには、
アクション「集中検分」を使用したのち、「純化」を使用します。
これを繰り返し、収集品アイテムを採集してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_005_002<tab>Gatherers seeking to procure items with higher collectability must be certain to equip gear with higher <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gathering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> ratings, as these attributes influence the effectiveness of actions that raise collectability.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_005_002<tab>より高い収集価値を狙う場合は、
装備を整えて、「獲得力」「技術力」を高めてみましょう。
収集品採集用アクションの効果が高くなります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Of course, these actions cannot be used to their full potential without sufficient <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>GP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. A healthy balance of all three attributes is essential to make the most of your gathering.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_005_003<tab>「GP」が不足しているようであれば、
装備を整えて、「GPmax」を高めてみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_006_000<tab>The collectability value of fish follows a simple rule─the bigger, the better.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_006_000<tab>水産物は採集した「魚のサイズ」が、
そのまま「収集価値」となります。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Upon arriving at the fishing hole or teeming waters where your desired quarry resides, use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> action, then begin fishing or spearfishing.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_006_001<tab>収集品として求められている魚がいる釣り場や漁場へ行き、
アクション「収集品採集」を使い、
釣り、または刺突漁を開始しましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_006_002<tab>When fishing, using <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by effective hooking actions will increase your chances of reeling in a big one.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_006_002<tab>釣りでは、アクション「ペーシェンスII」を使ったあと、
適切なフッキングアクションを選ぶことで、
大きな魚を狙うことができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Should you still find yourself catching only small fry, try outfitting yourself with better equipment to raise your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_GUIDE_006_003<tab>サイズが思ったように上がらない場合は「技術力」を、
装備を整えて高めてみましょう。

Furthermore, Margrat deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>Information on how to find individual items may be found in the following manner:
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>また、納品するアイテムの入手方法については、
それぞれ以下の方法で調べることができます。

target:

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>The higher an item's collectability, the greater the reward you will earn from Margrat upon successful delivery.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>それぞれの納品アイテムは「収集価値」が高いほど、
納品時の報酬を多く得ることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>To learn more about collectables and how to increase collectability, speak with Margrat and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Learn about custom deliveries<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>「収集価値の上げ方について」知りたい時には、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけて、
「『お得意様取引』について聞く」を選んで確認しましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Margrat's trust.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>依頼品を納品したことで、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>は、あなたの事を信頼し始めました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>With each successful delivery, Margrat will grow more and more satisfied with your efforts. Fill the gauge completely and Margrat's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, giving you the opportunity to learn more about her.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>納品時に得られる「信頼度」の蓄積を示すゲージが、
最大まで溜まると、「信頼ランク」が上昇し、
<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>の新たなストーリーを見ることができます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>You can make up to six deliveries in a given week. Deliver the items Margrat needs, and deliver them often to win the trust and praise of your loquacious associate!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>また、1週間で最大6回まで納品することが可能です。
積極的に収集品の納品を行い、
信頼ランクを上昇させていきましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>You have reached the weekly limit for deliveries. You may begin again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>今週分の納品権を、すべて消費しました。
（地球時間）毎週<var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((日)) ((月)) ((火)) ((水)) ((木)) ((金)) ((土)) /var>曜日の<var 08 E0DB0D ((午後)) ((午前)) /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0102030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 01 /var>時に、納品権が付与されます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_000<tab>Sometimes a good cushion is all you need to transform any old chair into posterial paradise. I've even heard of designs that incorporate gelatinous material sourced from─well. So long as it's comfortable, right?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_000<tab>腰痛対策として、椅子を取り換えるのはもちろん、
クッションを敷くだけでも大違いのはずさ！
ゲル状の素材を用いるのもいいと聞いたことがあるよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_001<tab>Treats and toys seem like promising candidates, but whether your devotion will be requited for long─if at all─depends on the kitty in question. Perhaps a wad of crinkly paper or a simple box will suffice?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_001<tab>猫の気を引くものといえば、玩具やおやつが定番だよね。
興味を持ってくれるかどうかは気分次第らしいけど！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_002<tab>It sounds like you're free to procure anything from grotesquely realistic clay sculptures to adorable plush creatures. Let it be known that I humbly request permission to squeeze should your donation be of the latter persuasion.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_002<tab>モンスターを模してさえいれば、
彫像でも模型でもぬいぐるみでも構わないんだったね。
さあ、君の力作を見せておくれよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_003<tab>Eye drops may seem like the obvious <var 1A 02 /var>solution<var 1A 01 /var>─ha! Get it?─but if you ask me, Grondilvet might benefit as much if not more from a fluffy bed or an eye mask. A quarter-bell nap can do wonders for one's health.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_003<tab>疲れ目には目薬が有効、あとは簡易ベッドなんかもいいかもね。
下手につらいのを押して作業を続けるより、
アイマスクでもして15分眠る方が効果的というものさ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_004<tab>Any number of things can help facilitate relaxation─refreshing drinks, tasty snacks, mammet masseurs, you name it. All the more effective when prepared by <var 29 EB02 /var> <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>self!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_001_004<tab>休憩に入って、凝り固まった体をほぐす……
飲み物や軽食をとって人心地つく……
君お手製の品でそれができるなら、活力だって即充填さ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_000<tab>Stones with magnetic properties and herbal compresses are supposedly effective remedies for ailing backs, but do you know what's even better? Actual rest.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_000<tab>磁気を帯びた石や、薬草を塗った湿布薬をつけておけば、
ひとまず腰痛は緩和されるはず。
まあ、休むのが一番なんだけどね！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_001<tab>There is a plant which can induce a state of euphoria in felines, as I recall. Failing that, there's always the classic sandbox, which cats may utilize for their, er...daily constitutionals.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_001<tab>確か、ある種の植物を嗅いだり噛んだりすると、
猫はリラックスするんだとか。
あとは、心地よい砂場も快適な暮らしに必要らしいね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_002<tab>Let's give Ibuki whatever she needs to reverently whisper, “I've created a <var 1A 02 /var>monster<var 1A 01 /var>.” That's how we'll know we're on the right track.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_002<tab>完成品ではなく、素材でも構わないとイブキくんは言っていた。
模型は組み立てる過程こそが楽しいって語る人もいるし、
それ自体が息抜きなのかもね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_003<tab>Here's a clever trick for pain relief: warm some stones or poultices and then press them to your eyes. Or neck. Or back. Or anywhere, really...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_003<tab>君が鉱石やハーブを取ってこられるなら、
それを温めて布で包み、目に当てるのがいいと思う。
私もたまにやるんだ……目とか首とか腰とかにさ……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_004<tab>Our refreshment room is supplied with water and tea, but what could spark more joy than knowing <var 29 EB02 /var> has topped up our ice and replenished our leaves? Our beverages will never taste better, this I can assure you.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_002_004<tab>休憩室に置かれたポットに、しっかり冷えた水が入っているとか、
香りのいいお茶が入っているとか……嬉しくないかい？
君の集めてきた品で、そういう幸せを実現させてほしいな！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_000<tab>Back pain may be a symptom of a deficiency of nutrients essential for bone development. The positive effects of a balanced diet may not manifest immediately, but who doesn't <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> better after a healthy meal?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_000<tab>根本的な腰痛対策には、
栄養を採り、骨を健康に保っておくことが不可欠だ。
即効性はないだろうけど、そこはほら、気分だよ気分！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_001<tab>Some cats can't eat fish, and most fish can't eat cats, but what can some cats eat that most fish can't? ...Catfish.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_001<tab>水辺で暮らす猫は、魚を食べることも多いんだとか。
魚種の確認は必要だけど、たまにそんな食事が出てきたら、
喜んでくれるかもしれないね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_002<tab>Certain shells are ground into powder for their pigments, and yet others make delightful decorations as they are. The right shade or sparkle can spur the spirit into a creative frenzy!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_002<tab>君が漁師なら、染料や装飾品の素材となる貝殻とかどうかな？
色ひとつ、煌めきひとつから自作する立体造形物……
イブキくんたちも燃えるはずさ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_003<tab>Blueback fish are apparently rich in nutrients that help prevent ocular exhaustion and dry eyes. Let's hope Grondilvet and his colleagues like seafood!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_003<tab>聞くところによると、青魚に含まれる成分が、
疲れ目の予防や乾燥対策として有効なんだとか。
よし、せっせと食べてもらおうじゃないか！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_004<tab>After exhausting our daily cerebral capital, we often find ourselves gazing vacantly into the abyss...but think how less ominous it would be to gaze vacantly into an aquarium filled with colorful fish! Truly the height of luxury and far better for the soul.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_KNOWLEDGE_MARGRAT_003_004<tab>仕事で思いっきり頭を使うと、
何も考えず、ぼーっとしたくなることがあるんだ。
そんなときに眺める綺麗な熱帯魚、みんな気に入るはずだとも！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_JUDGEMENT_MARGRAT_000_000<tab>...Yes, this should do nicely! A timely delivery of sufficient quality. Bravo!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_JUDGEMENT_MARGRAT_000_000<tab>……うんうん、ありがとう！
品質を満たし、納期も守っているだなんて、
実に立派な仕事ぶりだ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_JUDGEMENT_MARGRAT_000_001<tab>...Well, well! If I were a small animal, I might be inclined to run circles around you in delight. But I'm not, so I won't. Thank you, though!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_JUDGEMENT_MARGRAT_000_001<tab>……うんうん、ありがとう！
要求された品質を上回り、さらに納期も守っているだなんて、
すごい……えらい……いたたまれない……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_JUDGEMENT_MARGRAT_000_002<tab>...Do you normally fling items of extraordinary quality to whomsoever is in need? Because such behavior may condition people to trail behind you like awestruck ducklings─myself included.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_JUDGEMENT_MARGRAT_000_002<tab>……いや、だからといって、
こんな上等品を持ってくるかい普通！？
資材院に頼むより、よっぽどいい結果だよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_JUDGEMENT_MARGRAT_000_003<tab>...Even after all this time, your capacity for peerless quality is astounding. How could I <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> break into celebratory dance? ...Embarrassing? Perish the thought!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_JUDGEMENT_MARGRAT_000_003<tab>……って、相変わらずの上等品だなあ！
君は本当に、私たちを喜ばせるのが上手いんだから……
また踊り出したくなっちゃうよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>所持品に空きがないため、信頼ランク上昇の報酬を、
受け取ることができません。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>To collect your reward, make room in your inventory and speak with Margrat once more.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>所持品を空けてから、<var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var>に話しかけてください。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_BEFRANKUP_MARGRAT_000_000<tab>These should make all the difference! Wait here; I'll go and deliver them to my colleagues.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_BEFRANKUP_MARGRAT_000_000<tab>これだけの品なら、きっといい感じに腰を救ってくれるはず。
さっそく、うちの研究室で配ってくるよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_BEFRANKUP_MARGRAT_001_000<tab>Cats have never struck me as particularly cheerful creatures, but even the most tenebrous tomcat will surely be moved to purr by all you've brought us. Give me a moment to present these gifts to Roaring Spring.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_BEFRANKUP_MARGRAT_001_000<tab>私は猫の生態にはあまり明るくないけど、
これならメロメロになってくれる気がするよ。
ローリング・スプリングくんに渡してくるから、少し待ってて！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_BEFRANKUP_MARGRAT_002_000<tab>Well, if Ibuki and her team aren't anything less than delighted, I think we may have to consider <var 1A 02 /var>them<var 1A 01 /var> monsters. I'll just be a moment.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_BEFRANKUP_MARGRAT_002_000<tab>イブキくんたちも大喜びするんじゃないかな。
彼女たちの研究室まで届けてくるとしよう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_BEFRANKUP_MARGRAT_003_000<tab>Right then! I do believe we've accumulated sufficient succor for our blearily blinking comrade. I shall be back anon.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_BEFRANKUP_MARGRAT_003_000<tab>よし、急いでグロンディルヴェくんのところへ届けてくるよ。
目をシパシパさせながら待っているだろうからね！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_001<tab>The results are in. Those items you procured for us...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_001<tab>ただいま。
みんなと一緒に活用してみたんだけど……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_002<tab>...are the best thing since sliced Archon loaf! Ahahahahaha!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_002<tab>ヒハハハハ！
なんだかとってもいい感じ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_003<tab>No longer shall our backs suffer the cricks and cramps of outrageous furniture! With renewed health and mental clarity may we set upon our work and meet our deadlines without need for extensions!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_003<tab>これでもう腰痛に悩まされなーい！
その分、作業に集中できて、
締め切りにだって間に合う気がする！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_004<tab>...Probably!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_004<tab>…………かろうじて……多分！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_005<tab>Ahem. Theatrics aside, we are very grateful to you, kind <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((sir)) /var>. I'm afraid my complaints superseded a more civilized greeting, so allow me to properly introduce myself.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_005<tab>いやはや、いきなり難題を押しつけて悪かった。
考えてみたら、ちゃんとした自己紹介すらしていなかったね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_006<tab>My name is Margrat, and I work as a specialist in propulsion engineering here in Sharlayan Hamlet.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_006<tab>私は、推進魔法工学研究室のマーグラット。
魔導船の製造においては、動力機関の開発に携わっていたんだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_007<tab>Under the supervision of Kokkol Dankkol, my team participated in the development of not just the aetherburner, but the myriad ancillary propulsion systems of the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_007<tab>あの船には、中核を成すエーテル縮退炉のほか、
複数の動力機関が搭載されていてね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_008<tab>As our assignment concerned the crux of the project, we worked in tandem with a variety of other laboratories.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_008<tab>統括責任者であるククロ・ダンクロ氏のもと、
うちを中心にいくつもの研究室が協力して、
各方面から作業を進めていたのさ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_009<tab>My team was charged with performing analyses of the physical and aetherial phenomena to which the internal components would be subjected.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_009<tab>たとえば私のチームが担当していたのは、
機関内部で発生する、魔法的、物理的現象の検証だ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_010<tab>Another team calculated the necessary energy costs of all propulsion systems and proposed refinements to improve aetherial conductivity...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_010<tab>ほかのチームでは、エーテル伝導率なんかを計算して、
動力機関全体の必要コストを導き出していた。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_011<tab>And yet <var 1A 02 /var>another<var 1A 01 /var> team drafted the plans that reconciled all our disparate findings into one cohesive image. Thus we spun our web of productivity.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_011<tab>そういった諸々の結果を踏まえて、
具体的な設計図も作らなくちゃならない。
それにもまた専任のチームがあって……って感じかな！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_012<tab>Of course, a specialist is only as special as the demand for their expertise. So once the Final Days were thwarted and the threat to our lives no more, the threat to our <var 1A 02 /var>livelihoods<var 1A 01 /var> reared its ugly head.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_012<tab>いずれにせよ、分野が分野だろう？
終末という切迫した需要が消えたあとも食っていけるのかって、
みんな心配していたものだよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_013<tab>Thankfully, our experience with the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> was of value to Garlond Ironworks, who offered my team the opportunity to collaborate on new airship engines. And so we live to labor another day!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_013<tab>そしたら、魔導船の仕上げを手伝ってくれたときの縁で、
ガーロンド・アイアンワークスからお声が掛かってね。
今は共同開発って形で、飛空艇用の新型動力機関を製作中！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_014<tab>True to their Garlean roots, they rely heavily on ceruleum to power their engines, but with a few adjustments raw aether can also─
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_014<tab>ガーロンド社といえば、
技術的にはガレマールの流れを汲む会社だ。
やっぱり青燐水を燃料とした機構に強くって……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_015<tab>...Ah, but you know all about aether's potential, don't you! Tell me, why <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> you need those tanks?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_015<tab>燃料で思い出した！
君たち、どうしてエーテルタンクなんて探していたんだい？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_016<tab>It's not often─or ever, really─that people come clamoring for tanks with the capacity to power an interstellar vessel. Fancied a jaunt to the moon, did you? Ha ha!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_016<tab>あれを使わなきゃならない状況なんて、
そうそうないと思うんだけど……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_017<tab>...You ripped a <var 1A 02 /var>hole<var 1A 01 /var> in the moon!? To forestall a voidsent invasion.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_017<tab>月にヴォイドゲートをブチ開け、
異世界から迫る危機を退けるため……！？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_018<tab>Ahahaha! Pull the other one, it's got bells on! Next you'll be claiming you're a Scion. Next stop, Ultima Thule!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_018<tab>なんて大胆な作戦だ！
まるで魔導船に乗ってウルティマ・トゥーレを目指した、
「暁」の人たちみたいじゃないか！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_019<tab>...Hm? Why are you giving me that look?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_019<tab>えーっと……？
私、何かおかしなことを言ったかい？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_020<tab>...Wait. What did you say your name was?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_020<tab>もしかして、君……
「みたい」じゃなくて、本当に「暁」の人だったりする？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_021<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>. Right. The very <var 29 EB02 /var> who went to Ultima Thule with the other Scions.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_021<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>……
じゃあ、君が、あの……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_022<tab>...Rhalgr smite you, Theopauldin. Would it have <var 1A 02 /var>killed<var 1A 01 /var> you to say something!?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_022<tab>ま、まいったな……！
終末のときは立て込んでたから、私も含め、
大多数の研究員は「暁」の人たちに会えず仕舞いだったんだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_023<tab>All of us were...were so consumed by work back then that we never got so much of a glimpse of the Scions, let alone...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_023<tab>だからその、気づかなくて……
本部長が、ちゃんと言ってくれたらよかったんだけど……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_024<tab>And now here I am whinging to you about <var 1A 02 /var>back pain<var 1A 01 /var>. What a laugh...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_024<tab>ハハ……なんだよもう……
こんなのって、ありかよう…………。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_025<tab>...A-Apologies! I had no idea you were <var 1A 02 /var>the<var 1A 01 /var> <var 29 EB02 /var>! It's, uh, quite a lot to process...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_025<tab>悪い悪い、思ったより有名人だったから驚いてしまった！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_026<tab>Thank you for taking the time to help us.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_026<tab>……君が用意してくれた品、大切に使わせてもらうよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_027<tab>And, um...if you're so inclined, we would be terribly grateful for your continued assistance!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_027<tab>それはそれとして、だ！
今回の件しかり、シソーロス資材院は、
「あったら快適なのにな～！」の要望に応じきれていない。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_028<tab>Thesauros is unlikely to loosen its purse strings any time soon, and we're still in dire need of things to improve our quality of life here in Labyrinthos.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_028<tab>君さえよければ、引き続き、
そういった物品の供給に協力してくれないかな？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_029<tab>What say you? I'll make you an honorary member of our team─or better yet, my own personal gleaner!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_029<tab>いうなれば……そう、私の個人的で独断的な収集を請け負う、
プライベート・グリーナーとしてさ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_Q1_001_030<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_Q1_001_030<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A1_001_031<tab>The honor would be mine!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A1_001_031<tab>よしきた、任せろ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A1_001_032<tab>Compensation? Benefits? “Sod you, pay me,” as they say.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A1_001_032<tab>報酬が出るのなら……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_033<tab>An answer fit for a hero! Glad to have you with us.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_033<tab>いい返事！
これは非常にウキウキしてしまうな！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_034<tab>Spoken like a born freelancer! But to answer your questions, I could paper the city with the amount of scrips I have lying around. You have my word that we shan't leave you wanting.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_034<tab>出す出す！
結構持ってるんだ、あのスクリップ。
働き損にはさせないって、約束するよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_001<tab>Our resident cat-lover insisted that he address you personally, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_001<tab>ただいま！
彼が君に直接お礼を言いたいっていうから、連れてきたよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_002<tab>I wanted to thank you for your many thoughtful donations. Their quality is astounding!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_002<tab>やあ、この度はどうもありがとう。
すごく上等な品が届いたものだから、びっくりしたよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_003<tab>The lab cats have taken to them straightaway. Just seeing the joy writ plain upon their furry little faces has lifted the spirits of the whole team.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_003<tab>うちの研究室でお世話している猫さんたちも、
すっかり気に入ったみたいでね。
メロメロになっている猫さんたちに、僕たちもメロメロさ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_004<tab>By the by, have you given any thought as to what sort of research Roaring Spring and his crew of cat-lovers might specialize in?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_004<tab>依頼をするときに言ったよね。
彼がどんな研究をしている人なのか当ててみて、ってさ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_005<tab>It may defy expectations, given what you've learned of them thus far, but any guesses?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_005<tab>それで……こちらの猫大好きおじさんたちは、
いったい何を研究していると思う？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_006<tab>Believe it or not, they are all experts in aero- and aetherdynamics─the studies of how air and aether move, respectively.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_006<tab>彼らはね、空飛ぶ船の設計に欠かせない、
「空気やエーテルの動き」を取り扱っているんだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_007<tab>It is their comprehensive understanding of these mechanics which enabled them to devise not only the optimal form of our teeny-tiny toy boat, but that of its individual components as well.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_007<tab>航行する船の周りで、
どのように空気やエーテルが流れるのか……
船体や整流パーツの適切な形状とは……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_008<tab>So while <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> were all losing our heads over the aetherburner, Roaring Spring and his colleagues were calmly ensuring that we had somewhere to stick the damnable thing.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_008<tab>なーんてことを、魔導船の開発においても、
地道にやってくれていたわけだね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_009<tab>...Which brings me to my question: why is your laboratory overrun with felines? Did the stress finally break you?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_009<tab>けど、そんな研究室が猫まみれになってる理由は、
私にも見当がつかないな。
ストレスが連鎖爆発でもした？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_010<tab>Not as such. Our kitties are the fluffy keystones of our latest intellectual challenge.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_010<tab>いいや、猫さんこそが僕たちの新たな挑戦……
大事な大事な研究の中核なんだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_011<tab>In the aftermath of the Final Days, we received a letter from an Eorzean naturalist named Marcette, who, er...<var 1A 02 /var>stridently<var 1A 01 /var> implored us to investigate a rather puzzling phenomenon.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_011<tab>終末の騒動が落ち着いてきたころ、
エオルゼアで活躍する博物学者のマルセット氏から、
うちの研究室に手紙が届いてね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_012<tab>The “spontaneous flight of traditionally flightless organisms.”
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_012<tab>かねてより謎とされてきた「何故だか空を飛べる生物たち」……
その真相解明に向けて、力を貸してほしいと頼まれたんだよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_013<tab>Shocking, yes. Imagine an adamantoise or dhalmel suddenly rising into the air and darting away!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_013<tab>驚くべきことだけれど、
アダマンタスやダルメルといった地上を歩行する種の中に、
突如、空を飛べる個体が生じることがある。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_014<tab>But while such incidents may seem queer and inexplicable, we believe we can identify the root cause. Insofar as it relates to aviation, at least.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_014<tab>彼らの飛行は、不思議な現象に思えるだろう。
でも、「飛んでいる」という事実がある以上、
そこに生じている力は僕たちで導き出せるはずなんだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_015<tab>And once we know how these aerial feats were accomplished, we can assess which subjects may be manifesting latent abilities and which ones may be outliers of one sort or another.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_015<tab>それを足掛かりとして、自在に飛べる理屈を解明する。
すると、通常の個体と飛べる個体の差も、
見えてくるかもしれない……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_016<tab>For her part, Marcette seems convinced that there are no outliers─that every subject was possessed of “ancestral levitational predisposition”─but regardless of the outcome, our research may revolutionize our understanding of aviation!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_016<tab>ひいては、マルセット氏の提唱する、
「古代レビテト因子要因説」のような、
新機軸の発見に繋がる可能性も……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_017<tab>Indeed, even with my limited expertise, I can see the potential...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_017<tab>なるほど、重大なプロジェクトだね。
そうして君たちはマルセット氏と手を組み、
調査をはじめたわけだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_018<tab>Naturally, our first step was to observe flight-gifted samples in captivity. And among those we collected, we found...<var 1A 02 /var>it<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_018<tab>まずは飛べる個体を集め、観察するところから。
そんな中で、僕たちは出会ってしまったんだ……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_019<tab>An enormous flying kitty cat!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_019<tab>空飛ぶ、<var 4A ((大きくて)) ((ビッグ)) /var><var 4A ((ふかふかな)) ((ファット)) /var><var 4A ((猫さん)) ((キャット)) /var>に……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_020<tab>Such grace! Such beauty! How could the air and aether <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> embrace you? How could the laws of nature not contort themselves to cradle your winsome curves!?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_020<tab>ハァァ……君はどうやって浮いているんだろう……！
全方向どこから捉えても愛くるしいあの曲線、
その周りで何が起きているのかな？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_021<tab>Yet a mystery it remains. A fabulous, fluffy mystery. One to which we will devote our waking days to unravel.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_021<tab>まさにミステリアス！　なんてファビュラス！
僕たちは夢中だ、人生を捧げることを決めたと言ってもいい。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_022<tab>...That's wonderful, Roaring Spring! I hope you all find fulfillment in both your pioneering research and your kitties' care.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_022<tab>いやぁ、運命の出会いってあるものだねぇ！
これからも彼らを大切にして、
ともに素晴らしい研究成果を挙げてくれたまえ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_023<tab>Thank you, Margrat. I know we shall.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_023<tab>誠心誠意がんばるよ。
ありがとう、マーグラット。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_024<tab>And thank <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, my friend. We are fortunate to have been aided by such an accomplished gleaner.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_024<tab>そちらの君も……。
これほど的確な仕事をしてくれるんだから、
さぞかし名のあるグリーナーなんじゃないかい……？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_025<tab>Yes, well. “Gleaner” may have been the term I used to describe <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> for simplicity's sake, but truth be told, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> isn't of the guildship.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_025<tab>ああ、便宜上そう呼ばせてもらっているけれど、
<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>はギルドシップのグリーナーではないよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_026<tab>This is <var 29 EB02 /var>. One of the Scions who went aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_026<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>……
我らが魔導船に乗った、あの「暁」の一員さ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_027<tab>...What?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_027<tab>…………本当に？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_028<tab>So I've been waxing poetic about kitty cats to...no, <var 1A 02 /var>commissioning<var 1A 01 /var> kitty goods from...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_028<tab>うぁぁ……僕ってばなんてことを……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_029<tab>I-If you'll excuse me! ...<var 1A 02 /var>Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa<var 1A 01 /var>!!!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_002_029<tab>お手数おかけしましたぁぁぁ……！！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_030<tab>...I'll, er. Go and check on him later.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_030<tab>……まあ、私たちにもいろいろあるのさ。
あとでちゃんと、驚かせちゃったことを謝っておくよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_001<tab>Look, I've procured something of my own! A researcher brimming with gratitude.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_001<tab>ただいま、イブキくんも連れてきたよ！
せっかくだから、評判を直接聞いてもらおうと思ってさ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_002<tab>None of us were expecting anything remotely close to the quality of what you delivered. The whole team couldn't be happier.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_002<tab>あんないいものが届くなんて、
正直、予想もしてなかったというか……
ウチも研究室の仲間たちも、大盛り上がりですよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_003<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Finally<var 1A 01 /var> we'll have furnishings more inspiring than peeling wallpaper and criminally slow timepieces. I can feel my investment in the drudgery improving already!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_003<tab>ほら、身の回りに好きなものが飾られてると元気が出ません？
おかげさまで、これからはさらに気合が入りそうです！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_004<tab>So? What do you suppose Ibuki and her colleagues spend their time studying whilst their monstrous miniatures keep vigil?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_004<tab>どうだい、マイグリーナーくん。
モンスターの立体造形物に囲まれて燃え滾る彼女が、
いったい何の研究員か……予想はついたかな？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_Q_003_005<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_Q_003_005<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_003_006<tab>Life sciences! I'd stake my life on it!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_003_006<tab>生物を研究しているに違いない！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_003_007<tab>Monster...materials?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_003_007<tab>そこから採れる素材の研究とか……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_003_008<tab>Have we confirmed they're not actually adventurers in disguise?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_003_008<tab>研究員ではなく冒険者では？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_009<tab>Oh, don't do that! While biologists were called in for the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>'s development, they didn't belong to Ibuki's cohort. Although I can see why you might assume so.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_009<tab>この依頼内容じゃ、そう思うよね。
確かに魔導船の開発には生物学的な意見も必要だったけど、
彼女たちの役目はまた別だ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_010<tab>Warm! Very warm indeed!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_010<tab>おおっ、さすがだね！
当たらずも遠からずというやつだ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_011<tab>Ahahaha! Skepticism well warranted, to be sure.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_011<tab>ヒヒ、確かにこの有様じゃなあ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_012<tab>Ibuki's team specializes in materials engineering, so they were tasked with deciding what the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> should be made of.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_012<tab>イブキくんの所属する研究室はね、
魔導船の材料を模索していたんだよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_013<tab>As the mission was of the greatest import, candidate materials were subjected to rigorous testing to ensure safe and reliable operation.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_013<tab>星の内外を航行するあの船は、使用する材料ひとつとっても、
検討に検討を重ねて決めなくちゃならない。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_014<tab>For instance, every component within the engines had to withstand both the heat and stress the engine itself generated, as well as whatever bumps and scrapes it might suffer during the course of the ship's journey.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_014<tab>たとえば推進機には、
運動によって生じる熱や衝撃に耐えられる材料を選ぶ……
といった具合にね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_015<tab>However, if the durable, heat-resistant materials they chose had been too heavy or difficult to work with, our starship would have been effectively the world's largest doorstop.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_015<tab>一方で、いかに頑丈だとしても、
重すぎたり加工しにくかったりしたら魔導船には不向きだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_016<tab>So to ensure the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> could actually fly and not be reduced to fondue in the process, Ibuki and her colleagues searched high and low for materials suited to each and every part. And on the occasion they failed to find what they needed, they rolled up their sleeves and created it themselves.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_016<tab>そういった諸々の条件をクリアする材料を探したり、
ときには自ら作り出したりするのが、イブキくんたちの仕事さ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_017<tab>People tend to be more interested in the bigger picture─by <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> is being made rather than what it's made <var 1A 02 /var>of<var 1A 01 /var>─but I've made my peace with it. It's a fairly mundane job, truth be told.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_017<tab>まあ、みんな「何が作られているか」には興味を持ちますけど、
「何で作られているか」なんて気にしませんからね。
地味ぃな仕事ですよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_018<tab>Not from where I'm standing! You and your lab are the heroes who help us realize our wildest dreams. We are forever in your debt.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_018<tab>おや、私たちはいつも難しい相談に乗ってくれる君たちに、
感謝しきりだけどね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_019<tab>Well, if you'd <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> like to repay the favor, you might try making a good faith effort to actually meet your deadline next time.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_019<tab>だとしたら、次こそは、
時間に余裕をもって依頼してこいってんです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_020<tab>These days, we mostly deal in arms and armor production with external collaborators.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_020<tab>外とやりとりするようになった最近では、
武具の製作に協力してくれって依頼がひっきりなしですね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_021<tab>No matter how much you improve upon the previous model, adventurers always demand harder, better, faster, <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> stronger...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_021<tab>どれだけ性能を上げても、
冒険者たちが、さらに上を要求してくるとかで……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_022<tab>Which necessitates a more in-depth understanding of the circumstances which demand such performance. So we conduct simulations based on actual and theoretical experiences of veteran adventurers.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_022<tab>そういう人たち向けの武具ってことなら、
やっぱり、強敵との戦いを想定しなきゃならねーです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_023<tab>Which in turn means extensive research into the myriad monstrosities of the world! Perhaps <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> extensive, given how it has influenced our team.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_023<tab>じゃあ具体的に、どういう性能があればいいのか……
それを洗い出すため、ウチの研究室総出で、
いわゆるモンスターについて調べまくりました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_024<tab>“Influenced” being “instilled an obsession in.”
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_024<tab>で、気づいたら深い沼の中にいたと。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_025<tab>Now whenever we see any reproduction of a monster, the potential battle begins...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_025<tab>模型やぬいぐるみを眺めながら想像するんですよ……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_026<tab>Sharp claws! A lumbering blow! No, wait─<var 1A 02 /var>toxic, molten breath<var 1A 01 /var>! All powerless to penetrate our perfectly selected materials!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_026<tab>ここから繰り出される鋭い一撃や、すさまじい殴打、
灼熱のブレスなんかを、ウチらの選んだ素材が弾く！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_027<tab>Then comes the counter─pikes piercing hardened scale! Blades carving through jets of viscous bile! Driving unimpeded towards their fleshy prize!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_027<tab>そして反撃のとき……！
硬い鱗や、まとわりつく粘液をものともせず、
衰え知らずの切れ味でズバッ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_028<tab>Aaah, I get shivers just thinking about it!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_028<tab>はぁぁー……たまんねーです……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_029<tab>...Considering your long and storied tenure, you may have worn or wielded something developed by Ibuki's team and not even known it!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_029<tab>君が冒険の際に身に着けている装備も、
イブキくんたちの研究と繋がっているかもしれないね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_030<tab>Are guildship missions so perilous these days?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_030<tab>どういうことです？
そちら、危険地帯での依頼も請け負っているとか？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_031<tab>...<var 29 EB02 /var>?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_031<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>……？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_032<tab>Hyaaaaaaaaaaaagh! What─ How─ Whe-huh!?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_032<tab>ビョビャアァァー！？！？
なん……待っ……そんな……ィィイ……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_033<tab>S-S-Signature! O-On the thing you just brought me, did you sign─!?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_033<tab>め、めめ、銘ッ！！
さっき納品してくれたものに、
「<var 29 EB02 /var>作」って入ってます！？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_034<tab>Just your initials on the underside!? No, <var 1A 02 /var>please<var 1A 01 /var>! Your full name, next time! Across the front!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_034<tab>端っこにチマッとそれとなく！？
嫌だ嘘だもっと主張してください次回からデカデカと……ッ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_035<tab>N-N-Name! D-Did you sign your name on what you brought!? “Collected by <var 29 EB02 /var>”!?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_035<tab>な、なな、名前ッ！
「<var 29 EB02 /var>が採りました」って、
さっき納品してくれたものに書いてあります！？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_036<tab>What do you mean you don't sign that sort of thing!? That's─well, no, that's fair. But...please sign <var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var> for me! Next time?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_036<tab>そんなのいちいち書いてない！？
嫌だ嘘だ書いてください次回からデカデカと……ッ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_037<tab>And <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, Margrat! How <var 1A 02 /var>dare<var 1A 01 /var> you conceal such crucial information!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_037<tab>チクショー！
やりやがりましたね、マーグラットさん！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_038<tab>Just wait till the rest of the team hears about this!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_003_038<tab>ええい撤退、研究室のみんなに報告だーッ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_001<tab>Look! Wouldn't you say Grondilvet's eyes glimmer with renewed vitality?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_001<tab>ただいま！
見てくれよ、グロンディルヴェくんったら、
前より少し目がぱっちりしたと思わないかい？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_002<tab>I sincerely doubt they <var 1A 02 /var>look<var 1A 01 /var> any different. But the efficacy of the items you provided is undeniable.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_002<tab>さすがに変わりないと思いますが……
そんな気になってしまうほど、
持ってきてくださった品が効いたのは事実です。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_003<tab>I've suffered fewer headaches, and my vision does seem clearer. I daresay this newfound comfort will enable me to execute my work with even greater precision.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_003<tab>目の霞みや頭痛が軽くなって、
快適なだけでなく、作業精度の向上も見込めそうだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_004<tab>You have been a boon to me and my team.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_004<tab>あなたに頼むことができて、実に幸運でした。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_005<tab>Out of curiosity, why so much intense squinting of late? It must be awfully delicate stuff to tax your eyesight so.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_005<tab>しかし、本格的な疲れ目対策がいるだなんて、
君のとこ、今はずいぶんと細かい作業をしているんだね？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_006<tab>Indeed it is. Our current assignment is complicated─sometimes punishingly so─but we are resolved to see it through.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_006<tab>ええ、とても緻密で困難な……
しかし絶対に成し遂げたい仕事なのですよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_007<tab>You see, during the ark's conversion to the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>, I spoke with Lominsan arcanists come to deliver supplies.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_007<tab>方舟を魔導船へと改造した際、荷物を運んできてくれた、
リムサ・ロミンサの巴術士と知り合いました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_008<tab>It wasn't long before we discovered, to our mutual delight, the uncanny similarities between arcanima and systems aetherology.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_008<tab>そもそも巴術とは、
南洋諸島にて発展した「算術」を祖とする魔法体系……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_009<tab>Arcane geometries were first conceived as a means to perceive and manipulate aetheric energy in specific natural environments─namely those of the south sea isles, the presumed birthplace of arcanima.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_009<tab>自然現象を算術的に解明し、
魔紋と呼ばれる図形として記すことで行使を試みたものです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_010<tab>But while our regulators were designed to serve a rather different purpose, the underlying principles of their operation are more or less the same.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_010<tab>そこに用いられる考え方は、
私たちの魔法制御と重なる部分も多い。
話すうちにそうと気づいた巴術士殿は、感激していました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_011<tab>Now that we needn't concern ourselves with the end of civilization, we are free to engage in joint research with our friends in the Arcanists' Guild.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_011<tab>そして平和が取り戻された今、
巴術士ギルドと私たちで共同研究をする運びになったのです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_012<tab>Sounds like our arrangement with Garlond Ironworks! What is your current objective?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_012<tab>へえ、うちとガーロンド社に似ているじゃないか。
具体的にはどんな研究を？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_013<tab>We seek to incorporate analytical and conditional branching functionalities into a framework utilizing arcane geometries.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_013<tab>彼らの描く魔紋に、私たちの方で、
「状態の測定」と「その結果による動作の分岐」を加えます。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_014<tab>By iterating this process, we hope to produce a single, comprehensive system capable of a heretofore unrealized feat.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_014<tab>その作業を繰り返し、
最終的には包括的なひとつの魔紋とすることで、
ついにできあがるのです……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_015<tab>To wit, one capable of automatically heating foodstuffs to optimal temperature for consumption!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_015<tab>誰でも手軽に、加減を間違えることなく、
食品をあたためることのできる機構が……ッ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_016<tab>Wh-What did you just say!?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_016<tab>な、なんだって……！？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_017<tab>You mean, our days of eating cold Archon burgers would be over? Your arcane wotsit would be able to restore them to their original juicy glory!?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_017<tab>それはつまり、買ってきたはいいが作業に追われて食べ損ね、
冷え冷えになってしまった賢人バーガーを、
自動で適温にあたためてくれる……そういうことなのかい！？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_018<tab>Mankind need never suffer cold burgers again.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_018<tab>ええ……。
人類はもう、冷めたバーガーを前に悲しまなくていいのです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_019<tab>Byregot has blessed you with His genius, Grondilvet! The world will never be the same after your aetheric food warmer is complete!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_019<tab>ああ、なんてこった！
君は工神ビエルゴの寵児か何かか！？
世界が変わる……その発明によって……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_020<tab>You agree, don't you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、君も楽しみだろう！？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_021<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Why is that name so familiar...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_021<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……？
というと、「暁の血盟」の……？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_022<tab>Oh dear...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_022<tab>あちゃー……興奮して、つい……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_023<tab>Er, about that. I should have mentioned sooner, but <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> is <var 29 EB02 /var> of the Scions. One of the heroes who traveled aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> to the end of the known universe.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_023<tab>君の予想どおりだよ。
<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>があの、<var 29 EB02 /var>さ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_024<tab>...Margrat. I expected more from you, of all people. To have let me in ignorance impose upon the goodwill of such an esteemed personage─
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_024<tab>いたずらが過ぎますよ、マーグラット。
魔導船の開発に携わった者にとって、<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>は……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_025<tab>I understand how you feel, I do. But that's <var 1A 02 /var>why<var 1A 01 /var> I...I just...wanted everyone to get to know <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_025<tab>わかってる、わかってるとも。
私だって気持ちはみんなと同じさ……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_026<tab>Not as a hero on a pedestal whom we would never dare to approach, but as a person, like you and me. And I wanted <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to get to know everyone, too. The nameless faces that worked so hard to make <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> journey possible, and raised their voices in cheer at <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> triumphant return.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_004_026<tab>だから取引を続けてきたんだ。
この人を実感して、この人に実感してもらうために。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_027<tab>...I suppose we <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> be glad for further donations, should <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> be willing and able to oblige us. My laboratory would of course contribute to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> due compensation, as well.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_027<tab>……研究は続いているので、また機会があればお願いします。
お渡しする報酬を、私たちの方でも用意しておきますので。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_028<tab>Until next time, then. ...And thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. For everything.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_004_028<tab>それでは、また。
本当に……ありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_100<tab>(-???-)Pardon me...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_100<tab>(-？？？？-)失礼します……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_101<tab>(-Reticent Researcher-)Erm, about that request I submitted earlier...have they reached a consensus?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_101<tab>(-ルガディン族の研究員-)あのぅ、この前お願いしたものは、どうなったでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_001_102<tab>...All materials necessary for your current research have been allocated. Additional supplies will not be forthcoming.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_001_102<tab>……研究に必要なものは提供済み、という認識だった。
さらにとなると、資材院からは出せない。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_103<tab>(-Reticent Researcher-)O-Oh... I see...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_103<tab>(-ルガディン族の研究員-)うう、そんなぁ……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_104<tab>Thus spoke the wise bureaucrats unto the obeisant workers. Tell us! What unreasonable desire did you dare voice to our overlords?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_104<tab>やあ、ホッジくんにフラれた仲間がいるぞ。
いったいぜんたい、何を要求したんだい？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_105<tab>(-Reticent Researcher-)Oh, hello, Margrat.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_105<tab>(-ルガディン族の研究員-)ああ……こんにちは、マーグラット。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_106<tab>(-Reticent Researcher-)I didn't think it was <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> unreasonable, all things considered. What are we supposed to do now...?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_106<tab>(-ルガディン族の研究員-)資材院の返答はとても残念だよ。
僕たちにとっては、
喉から手が出るほどほしいものだったのに……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_107<tab>Hmm... As good a chance as any...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_107<tab>ふむ……私だけじゃなくて……そういう趣向もありか……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_108<tab>I do believe we have your next commission!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_108<tab>頼れる私のグリーナーくん、
さっそく次の依頼を思いついたよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_109<tab>The despondent man you see before you is Roaring Spring, a fellow researcher formerly assigned to the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> project─albeit on a different team.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_109<tab>彼は、ローリング・スプリング。
やはり魔導船の開発に携わった研究員だけど、
私とは違う研究室の所属で、異なる役目を担っていたんだ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_110<tab>I would be much obliged if you could procure whatever it was Thesauros refused him. He's a gentle soul, deserving of far better treatment than he's received, and I think you'll find his area of expertise fascinating─if you can guess what it is, that is! Well?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_110<tab>そんな彼の欲する品を、用意してやってはくれないかい？
ついでに、どんな研究をしている人なのか当ててみてよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_111<tab>Rejoice, Roaring Spring! It just so happens that we have a special offer on all things Thesauros is too parsimonious to provide.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_111<tab>喜べ、ローリング・スプリングくん！
ただいま特別キャンペーン中につき、資材院に代わって、
君が求めているものを提供してしんぜよう！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_112<tab>My great and benevolent gleaner friend will be happy to deliver your unreasonable desires.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_112<tab>さあ、こちらの偉大で寛大なマイグリーナーくんに、
何がほしいか言ってみるといい。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_113<tab>L-Like I said, I don't think it's <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> unreasonable, it's just... Truly?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_113<tab>えっと……？
よくわからないが、いいのかい……？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_114<tab>Well then, er...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_114<tab>だったら……そのぅ…………

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_115<tab>C-C-Cat food!?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_115<tab>ネコサン！！！！！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_116<tab>O-Or treats? Toys! Anything to amuse and delight our laboratory's kitty cats!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_116<tab>そう、猫さんたちがメロメロになるような、
玩具やおやつがほしいんだッ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_117<tab>Their comfort is our comfort─their happiness, our happiness!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_117<tab>僕らの研究室においては、猫さんの愉しみこそが愉しみ！
猫さんの幸せこそが幸せであるからして！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_118<tab>Anything in bulk would be greatly appreciated!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_ROARINGSPRING_001_118<tab>できるだけ質のいいものを、たくさんお願いしたくーッ！！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_119<tab>Ahahaha! Kitty cats!? Since when did you and your colleagues become so adorable?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_119<tab>フフ、フヒヒヒ……猫だって……！？
君たちの研究室、いつの間にそんな可愛くなったのさ……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_120<tab>...A bit of a surprising request, but we can hardly fault him for his passion. See what you can come up with, and I'll be sure to pass it along!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_001_120<tab>予想外の品だったけど、切望されているのは間違いなさそうだ。
納品先は一旦私で構わないから、よろしく頼むよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_100<tab>(-???-)Oi, Hodge! I've come for my package. Where is it!?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_100<tab>(-？？？？-)うぉーーーーいホッジ！！
今日という今日は、頼んでたアレ、出しやがれってんですよ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_002_101<tab>...The items you requested were deemed nonessential.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_002_101<tab>…………無理、必要なものとは認められない。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_102<tab>(-Raging Researcher-)“Nonessential,” eh? And is my willingness to toil away in those bland biscuit boxes you call laboratories nonessential? Is my <var 1A 02 /var>motivation<var 1A 01 /var> nonessential!? Is it!?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_102<tab>(-アウラ族の研究員-)はあっ！？　なんでです！？
ウチらの意欲を上げるためには、必要不可欠なんですけど！？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_002_103<tab>...You are free to purchase whatever you like with personal funds.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_002_103<tab>………………自腹でどうぞ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_104<tab>(-Raging Researcher-)<var 1A 02 /var>You're<var 1A 01 /var> a personal fund!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_104<tab>(-アウラ族の研究員-)ムキィィィーーーーーッ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_105<tab>...Good one.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_105<tab>ホッジくんは人気者だなぁ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_106<tab>Ibuki? While I understand your frustration, you cannot simply unleash your concentrated ire all at once to effect a change. Nay, we must use the paymasters' methods against their agents. As they slowly grind away at our spirits, so too must we wear down Hodge.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_106<tab>おーいイブキくん、あんまり怒鳴ってやるなよ。
彼に絡むなら、せめて私のようにクドクドいきたまえ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_107<tab>I'll bear that in mind, Margrat. And how's your deadline looking?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_107<tab>誰かと思えば、マーグラットさんですか。
今日は締め切り大丈夫なんです？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_108<tab>I'll deadline <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> if you ever lead with <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> again!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_108<tab>や、め、て、く、れ、る、か、な！
出会い頭にその言葉を投げつけてくるのは！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_109<tab>S-Sorry, sorry. Clearly you <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> understand my frustration. I presume, like me, you've been <var 1A 02 /var>trying<var 1A 01 /var> to improve your team's working conditions, but to no avail...
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_109<tab>わ、悪かったですね……。
作業環境が整わなくて、こっちも苛立ってたんですよ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_110<tab>Precisely why I called you over. If Thesauros is giving you the cold shoulder, we may be able to help.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_110<tab>ああそうそう、声をかけた理由はそれだ。
資材院に袖にされて悶々としているなら、
力になれるかもしれないと思ってね。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_Q_002_111<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_Q_002_111<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_002_112<tab>My neck and shoulder muscles are generally warm from prodigious use.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_002_112<tab>気持ちよく労働できるの、大事！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_002_113<tab>You don't think this is going to be another cat thing, do you?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_A_002_113<tab>今度は何を要求されるやら……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_114<tab>The better for you to communicate your shared desire that none labor in misery! Huzzah!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_114<tab>ありがとう。
まったくの同感だよ、大事な人生を費やすんだからさ！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_115<tab>Who knows? There's no end to delightful surprises here in Labyrinthos!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_115<tab>ありがとう。
どうせなら君も楽しくなるようなものだといいね！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_116<tab>You're in good hands, comrade. As an extension of our special offer, let us provide you with the conveniences Thesauros won't.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_116<tab>ということで同志イブキくん！
ただいま特別キャンペーン中につき、
君の「あったら捗る」を叶えようじゃないか！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_117<tab>My exclusive gleaner is happy to procure anything your heart desires. You need but ask!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_117<tab>こちらのマイ・スペシャル・グリーナーくんに、
欲しいものを遠慮なく言ってみるといい！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_118<tab>I'm, er...not sure what's going on, but far be it from me to look a gift chocobo in the mouth!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_118<tab>なんと……！
よくわからねーですが、太っ腹なキャンペーン……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_119<tab>We would like...monsters! Fiends, feral beasts, voidsent, primals─whatever you can provide. Miniatures, that is!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_119<tab>ならモンスターを……！
猛獣、魔物、召喚獣、そういうものの立体造形物をウチらに！！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_120<tab>Any size, style, or shape. Wood carvings, life-sized cushions, soap sculptures. Honestly, <var 1A 02 /var>anything<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_120<tab>カテゴリは自由、彫像でも模型でもぬいぐるみでも大歓迎！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_121<tab>If you need specific examples, one of the Ironworks engineers is a warmachina fanatic who crafts stunningly realistic replicas. Or you might reference the more simplistic mammets created by that infamous Gridanian goldsmith.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_121<tab>テイストも問わねーです。
界隈で有名な、某ガーロンド社の原型師さんの作品みたいに、
完全再現を目指したリアル路線はもちろんのこと……

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_122<tab>Even if you can only manage supplies, we would be more than delighted to make our own miniatures! ...Time permitting.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_122<tab>あの「謎めいた彫金師さん」の作品みたいに、
大胆なデフォルメが利いているのもまた素敵……！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_123<tab>Right, well─now that I've thoroughly embarrassed myself, thank you in advance, kind stranger!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_IBUKI_002_123<tab>時間があれば自分たちでも作るので、
素材のままでも、すっごく嬉しいっていうか！
とにかくよろしくお願いしますですよ！！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_124<tab>Ibuki was assigned to the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> project as well. Any guesses as to what her specialty is? Let me know when you think you've figured it out─and when your first monstrous donation is ready for delivery!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_002_124<tab>ちなみに彼女も、魔導船の開発に携わっていた研究員だ。
どんな役目を担っていたやら……
依頼の品を用意しながら、推理してみて！

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_100<tab>(-Rational Researcher-)Ibuki just ran by shrieking like a jilted chocobo. Is something amiss?
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_100<tab>(-エレゼン族の研究員-)イブキが奇声を上げながら走り去っていきましたが……
何かあったのですか？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_101<tab>(-Rational Researcher-)...I suppose there's no telling with her. Never mind─ Hodge, I'm here to collect my supplies.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_101<tab>(-エレゼン族の研究員-)……まあいいでしょう。
先日発注したものを受け取っても？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_003_102<tab>...Your request was denied. You are encouraged to recuperate at home.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_003_102<tab>…………却下された。
普通に帰って休め、とのこと。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_103<tab>(-Rational Researcher-)Ha! That's rich.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_103<tab>(-エレゼン族の研究員-)フフフフフ……ご冗談を……。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_003_104<tab>Rich or not, that is the official answer.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_003_104<tab>残念ながら確定事項だ。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_003_105<tab>...But those two have a special offer for rejected petitioners.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_HODGE_003_105<tab>……ただ、そこで特別キャンペーンをやっている。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_106<tab>Why, Hodge! The very nerve of you!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_106<tab>ホッジくん！？
そんな丸投げしてくれなくてもいいんだよホッジくん！？

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_107<tab>(-Rational Researcher-)Well met, Margrat. I'm glad to find you in high spirits and not your usual state of inconsolable weeping.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_107<tab>(-エレゼン族の研究員-)ごきげんよう、マーグラット。
今日は泣き叫んでいないようで何よりです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_108<tab>(-Rational Researcher-)I believe we have yet to be acquainted. Grondilvet, systems aetherologist.
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_GRONDILVET_003_108<tab>こちらの方は初めまして……ですね。
システム魔法学研究室の、グロンディルヴェです。

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_109<tab>No, no, no! Grondilvet, your good breeding ruined our fun little game! I've been challenging <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to guess who did what on the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER10_00842_LCUT_RANKUP_MARGRAT_003_109<tab>あーあ、言っちゃった……！
クイズにならないじゃないか、いたって良識的な対応だけど！
